# GET /v1/customerReviews/{id}/relationships/response | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/customerReviews/{id}/relationships/response ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-customerReviews-_id_-relationships-response)

-  GET /v1/customerReviews/{id}/relationships/response 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/customerReviews/{id}/relationships/response

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-customerReviews-_id_-relationships-response#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/customerReviews/{id}/relationships/response
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-customerReviews-_id_-relationships-response#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-customerReviews-_id_-relationships-response#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[CustomerReviewResponseLinkageResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/customerreviewresponselinkageresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-customerReviews-_id_-relationships-response#see-also)

### [Getting Review Responses](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-customerReviews-_id_-relationships-response#Getting-Review-Responses)

[`Get a Customer Review Response`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-customerreviews-_id_-response)Get the response to a specific customer review.[`Read Customer Review Response Information`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-customerreviewresponses-_id_)Get information about a specific response you wrote to a customer review, including the response content and its state.
